channel.title: Outwar
channel.description:
Hey everyone I just got a question,
Who here plays the game Outwar? And if so on what server? I'm planning on starting a cheating revolution on the game, since they don't got all the fancy detection systems like Jagex has with Runescape, it should be easy.

item.title: Outwar
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

It might have been me. I spammed up his IRC by modding his program a little bit, so he added my host to the ban list. So I just gave the program a different ban list to check, problem solved.

Ill try to hook up my computer and get it to you. Maybe you can look at the coding and leech something out of it
[/quote]

I remember meeting somebody on Coron’s IRC that was from here, was it you?
and I have them all on my old HD but I dont have anywhere to hook up my PC. I’d have to unhook this one completely 5 minutes of hard work
and he asked me for it like 3 weeks ago

item.title: Outwar
item.dc:creator: @Waffendennis Waffendennis
item.description:
@Waffendennis wrote:

[quote=“Protosstribe, post:1, topic:65569”]I remember there were a game called AnotherWorld, which was almost a copy of RuneScape. The house models were taken from the Sims, some of the character models were taken from StarWars and then alot of things were taken from RuneScape, such as skills, “wilderness” et. c. This was just a thought if you maybe should cheat in that game instead… If it still exists though.

When I get home I can check out the client, to see that the name really was this. And if it still is online or something. But I don’t know if it was made in Java.[/quote]

No thanks, I want to cheat on OutWar not the game that you mentiond.

I made some progression, I made a auto attacked, but 2 days after they updated their images, now you got to to calculate some stuff, and then click the right answer.

Anyone still wants to help me?

Read full topic

item.description:

The thing is, Outwar asks for a security code on almost every page load (when I was playing it at least)

Then possibly comparing images from dumps would be better. I’m not sure how this would be possible, though. In SCAR, maybe but then if the project is going to be coded in Java, well you know what I mean.

About the Image security, you could do something like what autorune/sleepwalker did. Upload it and a human can type it ect.

item.title: Outwar
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Waffendennis:

I thought about making a java bot, but then how could I work around the image security system?

Just load the image, and pass it on to something else. Java seems more plausible to me, you don’t want trivial things like clicked / unclicked link coloring for browsers and font size, and want to do something else at the same time. You could probably acquire the fonts they use and somehow check against it.

I used to play on fabar, my account’s probably deleted by now.

Read full topic

item.title: Outwar
item.dc:creator: @Waffendennis Waffendennis
item.description:
@Waffendennis wrote:

Sorry guys for my late reply, but I’ve ben fairly busy lately.
I got time now again, so I really want to get this started.

I’m hoping I could get some support from our advanced SCAR scripters, I was thinking of what was possible, maybe a java application, I did some attempts but it failed.

So hereby i’m still requesting all the help I can get, I’m also asking help from the SCAR scripters.

I think it should be easy cheating with SCAR on this game, the only problem we’re facing is the ‘click on the word (image) that appears twice’ but I’m sure this wouldn’t be a to big problem.

I made a tool that dumps all those images, and there are only around 30 combinations that are possible, it’s most the same words but in different colours (red, blue, white, pink, purple) I could compile a image database with all those images that you can get, I’m sure this would be a big step towards something.

Again, I’m hoping that this could become something, maybe we could push it into something like we had in RS? :).

Just somethings:
-The cheating detection is very poor, you could basicly cheat all day and not get banned (they’re not advanced as Jagex is with RS)
-They’re coding is poor, the SQL database isn’t that good + their website code too, they’ve had some recent exploits that allowed root to the SQL database which gave access to all the information of the accounts on al the 4 servers.

Maybe it’s possible to get even more then cheatin out of it :).

Read full topic
